content:
The New York Times uses its common sense today by highlighting the disconnect between Congressmen refusing to raise workers wages while not hesitating to raise their own. madison Wisconsins Capitol Times takes it one step further by applying the national issue to a local race. but the winner today is The Los Angeles Times whose editorial board rightfully lambasts the Bush Administration for forcing Governors to ask the U.S PERIOD Forest Service to not put highways through their parks PERIOD Heres their opening

Two things about Gov PERIOD Arnold Schwarzeneggers push against new roads in untouched areas of Californias national forests It was an environmentally sound decision for a state that reveres its wilderness areas PERIOD And it was a decision the governor shouldnt have had to make in the first place PERIOD

Zing I love a good writing staff PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of University of Chicago PERIOD Your contributions go towards our annual website hosting costs and equipment costs PERIOD
